headline: 122 Ameriprise Financial Advisors Recognized on the 2025 Forbes "Best-in-State Next-Gen Wealth Advisors" List
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, August 26, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) today announced that 122 of its financial advisors have been named to the 2025 Forbes "Best-in-State Next-Gen Wealth Advisors" list. Each year, Forbes recognizes the top advisors under 40 years of age across the country based on several factors, including success in the business, compliance records, assets under management, and high ethical standards.
